p: Sixty-two children (67.4%) required some form of respiratory support and 17 (18.5%) required ventilatory support (non-invasive and/or invasive). Thirteen children received intravenous IVIG (2 in the non-severe and 11 in the severe HAdV group) and 17 children received steroids (5 in the non-severe and 12 in the severe group).
